sentence.Network_en: The doctor wrote a treatise on alcoholism.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位医生写了一篇关于酗酒问题的论文.

sentence.Network_en: " The Classics on Tea " , written by Lu Yu of the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D . ) was the world's earliest treatise on tea leave production.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国唐代陆羽写的《茶经》是世界上最早的茶叶制作专著.

sentence.Network_en: Aristotle wrote a treatise on literature called his Poetics.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚里士多德写了一本名为《诗学》的文学作品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... mortise n 榫眼 treatise n 论文 snobbish a 势利眼的.
[转]OG12 SC逐题点评_英语教程 ... injure,discharge 都应该是被动 treatise 论文，专著 and for 要有平行.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... treat 对待 treatise 论述 treatment 待遇.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... traverse 横越，穿过 treatise 专题论文 treatment 对待，待遇；处理，治疗.

list.abs: An expository treatise or series of annotations ; an exegesis ., 注释 , 训诂说明性的论述或一系列注解 ; 注解.
in this treatise , the authors present the general theory of orthogonal polynomials on the complex plane and several of its applications .在这篇论文里，那些作者提出关于复杂的飞机和它的一些申请的正交多项式的一般的理论。
A book or treatise on heraldry ., 纹章集关于纹章的书或论文.
医道 Dao4> of healing医论 medical treatise医醇剩义 Enriching the Meaning of the Wine of Medicine.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French tretis, from Old French traitier (see treat)

entry.def: A treatise is a long, formal piece of writing about a particular subject.

auth_sentence.content: Prior's treatise on evidence-gathering and due process ended.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prior's treatise on evidence-gathering and due process ended.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prior's treatise on evidence-gathering and due process ended.

auth_sentence.content: But it was also a bleak treatise on communist Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it was also a bleak treatise on communist Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it was also a bleak treatise on communist Russia.

auth_sentence.content: The book became the popular feminist treatise of its generation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The book became the popular feminist treatise of its generation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The book became the popular feminist treatise of its generation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,表示"……化,做等"; 2. 表名词,"物品,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+erc力量+ise物品,状态→n.练习,习题;训练,锻练
merchand=merchant商人+ise物品,状态→商人的东西→商品
mort死+ise物品,状态→木头敲进榫眼便使不再动摇
treat治疗,研究+ise物品,状态→n.论文
turquo=turkish土耳其的+ise物品,状态→绿松石来自土耳其而出名
author作家+ise……化,做等→允许其写作→许可,批准
authorise[v.授权,委任;许可,批准]→v.授权,批准
critic批评家+ise……化,做等→v.批评,批判
ex出+erc力量+ise……化,做等→v.训练,锻练;行使
fertile肥沃的+ise……化,做等→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ise……化,做等→重新活

means.word_mean: 专题著作, 专题论文, 专著
